sentences.sContent: She often does everything for me selflessly.
sentences.sCn: 她也是这样无私地对我的。

sentences.sContent: The drawing above suggests that people should selflessly dedicate themselves to their community as a whole.
sentences.sCn: 上面的这幅画启发人们应该无私地把自己奉献给整个社会。

sentences.sContent: On the blog, he has selflessly posted the results of his research, hoping that they will be of assistance to others.
sentences.sCn: 在博客中，他还无私地把自己所有成熟的研究成果和作品，都张贴了出来，力求对别人有所帮助。

words.tran: 自私自利；自我中心；任性
